item.title: By: Steven Myers
item.dc:creator: Steven Myers
item.description: I think it's more than tragedy. It's incompatible. Individuals who desire intimacy beyond brotherly love would maybe be better off, for the sake of their own harmony, to flee Hasidic life. Being dealt two cards such as same sex intimacy desire and Torah way minyan Chevre tenderness desire seems highly combative and destined for a painful crash. I'm awed by individuals who endure and thrive under such friction and don't hesitate to identify them as heroic.
item.content:encoded:
I think it’s more than tragedy. It’s incompatible.
Individuals who desire intimacy beyond brotherly love would maybe be better off, for the sake of their own harmony, to flee Hasidic life.
Being dealt two cards such as same sex intimacy desire and Torah way minyan Chevre tenderness desire seems highly combative and destined for a painful crash.
I’m awed by individuals who endure and thrive under such friction and don’t hesitate to identify them as heroic.
